com.fluidops.ajax.components

Class FAsynchContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FComponent
      • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FContainer
        • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FAsynchContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FEventListener

    public abstract class FAsynchContainer
extends FContainer
    An asynchronous container, which can be used to render the content (i.e. the inner component) asynchronously. Idea: when populating the view of the container, a java script function is executed at the client, which induces a second event in the backend. In this event (a different thread) the actual component is rendered.
    Author:
    as

        public FAsynchContainer(java.lang.String id,
                java.lang.String loadInformationHtml)
        Create a asynch container with custom load information. The loading information can contain html, such as for instance an animated gif which shows the loading state.
        Parameters:
        id -
        loadInformationHtml -

      • setLoadingInformation

        public void setLoadingInformation(java.lang.String width,
                         java.lang.String height,
                         java.lang.String... template)
        Specify the loading information to be displayed in the first place. If no (optional) template is specified, the default template (bordered box with loading text) is rendered. - Width and height must be valid CSS values, e.g. "600px" or "100%" - Width and height are replaced within template for space holders WIDTH and HEIGHT - Customization possible, if no spaceholders present
        Parameters:
        width -
        height -
        template -
